name: rose turtle
notes:
crochet an adorable rose or daisy turtle.

100% no sew pattern. not even one part to sew.

easy to crochet turtle plush! it will make the best gift for your kids or even a friend who loves turtles.

easy and quick pattern. it will take you about one hour to make it.


> **a free version of this pattern is available on the blog. [click here!][1]**

in the pattern, you will find instructions on how to crochet both turtles- the daisy and rose.

the turtle is crocheted using the no-sew method. first, we will crochet the fins and head and later attach them as we crochet along!

in the pdf pattern, we included many photos to guide you through!

skill level: easy

materials: 
- plush yarn 100gr 120m
- hook size 4mm
- safety eyes- 25 or 30mm
- fiberfill for stuffing
-stitch marker (optional)
-tapestry needle

if you have any questions contact us via private message!
